name: UBOAT SOP: Turn On Red Light
description:
[h1]UBOAT Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)[/h1]
[h3]Turn On Red Light[/h3]

Part of the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3322088593]UBOAT Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)[/url] collection.

This mod will have a crewman turn on the red light under the following conditions:
[list][*] The boat is not alarmed
[*] It is night time
[*] The boat has normal lighting (will not switch if blue)
[*] The boat will switch to white lights during the daytime if the red lights are on (not blue)
[/list]

Does not require a new game. May disable achievements (I don't really know)
author: Andargor
